mapper.select: SELECT * FROM contest WHERE kind = #{kind} ORDER BY endTime < now(),beginTime DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, 20

SELECT users.username,users.name,users.gender,users.school,users.faculty,users.major,users.cla,users.no,users.nick,users.rating,users.ratingnum,contestuser.statu,contestuser.time,contestuser.info FROM users LEFT JOIN contestuser ON(users.username=contestuser.username) WHERE contestuser.cid=#{cid} ORDER BY TIME DESC LIMIT #{pagenum},50
SELECT count(users.username) FROM users LEFT JOIN contestuser ON(users.username=contestuser.username) WHERE cid=#{cid}

SELECT id,(SELECT nick FROM users WHERE username=ruser) AS ruser,statu.pid,statu.cid,lang,submittime,result,score,timeused,memoryUsed,codelen FROM statu where cid=#{cid} order by id desc limit #{pagenum},50
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM statu WHERE cid = #{cid}

SELECT (SELECT nick FROM users WHERE username = contestuser.username) AS username,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM statu WHERE cid = #{cid} AND result=1 AND ruser=contestuser.username) AS acnum FROM contestuser WHERE cid=#{cid} ORDER BY acnum DESC
